EmailTemplate.description: Auto generated response sent to new leads with Augusta contact information
EmailTemplate.name: Web Lead Response Baltimore Blitz
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your interest in Sears Commercial
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Lead.Name},
<?xml:namespace prefix = o />
Thank you for taking the time today to discuss the value of Sears Commercial. Our goal is to enhance your business by providing high quality products, programs, and services.
In order to determine how we might best align in order to help meet your business objectives, your local Sears Commercial Account Manager will contact you within the next 2-3 business days to follow-up on the items discussed today. If you require immediate assistance, please contact our National Support Center at 1-800-359-2000.
Thanks again for speaking with us today, and we look forward to working with you very soon.
